description: Full Throttle - No one can beat Simon Cox in the contest forcavernous holes. A black muscle stud, when Chris Ward discoveredSimon several years ago in Southern California he thought he hadfound the eighth wonder of the world! Featured in films ever since,Simon remains the top bottom at Raging Stallion Studios, butt thisperformance takes his career to a new level. A competition-levelbodybuilder, Simon Cox exudes more horsepower than a Mack truck,and when sprawled across one of the motorcycles in the back of therepair shop he exudes more sexuality than all of his previous moviescombined! Enter Rik Jammer, and I do mean ENTER! Simon takesmore arm than anyone ever filmed, and when he gets punch fistedalmost to the elbow for what seems like hours, you know that you arewatching a butt hole performance like no other! No amateurs here--this is expert fisting by the best bottom and the best top working inporn today!
series: Rear End Collision 1 - Pop a Gasket
title: Rear End Collision 1 -  Pop a Gasket
